Java Developer
CPNI INC
Etobicoke, ON, CANADA; Mississauga, ON, CANADA; Toronto, ON, CANADA
Posted Mar 29, 2010
1 Position(s)



JAVA DEVELOPER
CPNI Inc. is a technology startup firm which provides application software and associated services to the financial industry, with a focus on Mobile Payments. Our technology is network-aware and has server and mobile phone components. Our flagship product facilitates money transfer services over the telephone, in a secured manner, and from anywhere in the world.
What We Need Most
Java professionals who simply love to create software. Our software development focuses on delivering wireless-based payment solutions using cutting-edge technologies. We'll give you some coding problems and you will blow us away with your brilliant solutions.
The Right Fit
Our formula for success starts with our people. We look for software experts by aptitude, and not mere training - in other words, serious techies who are proud of being techies. Our culture is based on the eXtreme Programming (agile) philosophy. If you are a programmer who is passionate about technology, loves collaborating with other keen minds, and possess tremendous skills with designing software and solving problems, let's talk.
The Challenges
The avant-garde Java pilot at CPNI has to be adaptive, learn a breadth of technologies, and be able to turn on a dime in this fast paced environment. Extraordinary is ordinary here. You'll be solving complex problems under pressure, mentoring other developers,and even parachuting into someone else's code. But you'll thrive.
Stuff our Hiring Managers Want to See
BS or MS in Computer Science or Engineering
Thorough understanding of the object-oriented paradigm
Well-developed and demonstrable coding and testing skills in Java
Nevertheless, experience with our current set of technologies will certainly help you thrive quicker
Java 5, Java 6
Java EE 5, Tomcat, Websphere, JBoss
MySQL, DB2, Oracle, Hibernate, JPA
J2ME, Objective-C, WAP, XHTML MP
Ruby, Buildr, FitNesse
Bottom Line
We are looking for software professionals who can really hit the high notes! You can make a difference and be part of a great story in Canadian high tech! For the right person, the opportunities are unlimited.
To Apply
Please send a cover letter telling us why you feel that you would qualify for this job along with your resume to: careers@cpni-inc.com .
